transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ek minute sir. Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Good evening sir. Good evening, good evening.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Mai Deepak baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye ji.
Executive: Aapko primary number change karna tha aapke profile pe usi se regarding maine aapko call kiya tha.
Customer: Kya cheez? Kya number kya keh rahe?
Executive: Aapko apna is profile mein mobile number change karwana tha na uske liye call kiya tha sir maine.
Customer: Mere staff se baat ho rahi thi morning mein kar lijiyega na aap.
Executive: Morning mein kar lu sir?
Customer: Haan morning mein kar lijiyega time thodi hai abhi to unke nikalne ka time ho gaya hai abhi.
Executive: Abhi baat nahi ho payegi unse?
Customer: Nahi sir aap nikal gaye na sir yaha se.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai kal mai kitne baje call kar lu unko?
Customer: Kal aap 11 baje ke kareeb kar lo sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir, theek hai.
Executive: Sir nahi spam mein nahi hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to change primary number.



Resolution:

- Executive will call back next day.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer next day at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- primary number, profile, change, call back
